definition: ancient bamboo reed instrument/Chinese shawm (probably related to central Asian zurna)

sentences.english: The Tartar pipe is a musical instrument often used by the nomadic minorities in Northern China.
sentences.chinese: 觱篥是中國北部遊牧民族常使用的一種樂器。

definition: ancient bamboo reed instrument/Chinese shawm (probably related to central Asian zurna)
xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes
double-ended skin drum with a narrow waist
guzheng or long zither/long zither with 13 to 16 strings, developed from guqin 古琴 during Tang and Song times/Japanese koto
ocarina/wind instrument consisting of an egg-shaped chamber with holes
reed-pipe wind instrument with a keyboard
to beat time by slapping one's thighs
